org.jclouds.azure.management.features

Interface HostedServiceApi


  • public interface HostedServiceApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the hosted services beneath your subscription.
    Author:
    Gerald Pereira, Adrian Cole
    See Also:
    docs, HostedServiceAsyncApi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String createServiceWithLabelInLocation(String serviceName, String label, String location)
      The Create Hosted Service operation creates a new hosted service in Windows Azure.
      String createServiceWithLabelInLocation(String serviceName, String label, String location, CreateHostedServiceOptions options)
      same as createServiceWithLabelInLocation(String, String, String) , except you can specify optional parameters such as extended properties or a description.
      String delete(String serviceName)
      The Delete Hosted Service operation deletes the specified hosted service from Windows Azure.
      String deleteDeployment(String serviceName, String deploymentName)
      The Delete Deployment operation deletes the specified deployment from Windows Azure.
      HostedService get(String serviceName)
      The Get Hosted Service Properties operation retrieves system properties for the specified hosted service.
      Deployment getDeployment(String serviceName, String deploymentName)
      The Get Deployment operation returns the specified deployment from Windows Azure.
      HostedServiceWithDetailedProperties getDetails(String serviceName)
      like get(String), except additional data such as status and deployment information is returned.
      Set<HostedServiceWithDetailedProperties> list()
      The List Hosted Services operation lists the hosted services available under the current subscription.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        Set<HostedServiceWithDetailedProperties> list()
        The List Hosted Services operation lists the hosted services available under the current subscription.
        Returns:
        the response object

      • createServiceWithLabelInLocation

        String createServiceWithLabelInLocation(String serviceName,
                                      String label,
                                      String location)
        The Create Hosted Service operation creates a new hosted service in Windows Azure.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - A name for the hosted service that is unique within Windows Azure. This name is the DNS prefix name and can be used to access the hosted service. For example: http://ServiceName.cloudapp.net//
        label - The name can be used identify the storage account for your tracking purposes. The name can be up to 100 characters in length.
        location - The location where the hosted service will be created.
        Returns:
        the requestId to track this async request progress
        See Also:
        docs

      • createServiceWithLabelInLocation

        String createServiceWithLabelInLocation(String serviceName,
                                      String label,
                                      String location,
                                      CreateHostedServiceOptions options)
        same as createServiceWithLabelInLocation(String, String, String) , except you can specify optional parameters such as extended properties or a description.
        Parameters:
        options - parameters such as extended properties or a description.

      • get

        HostedService get(String serviceName)
        The Get Hosted Service Properties operation retrieves system properties for the specified hosted service. These properties include the service name and service type; the name of the affinity group to which the service belongs, or its location if it is not part of an affinity group.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal

      • getDetails

        HostedServiceWithDetailedProperties getDetails(String serviceName)
        like get(String), except additional data such as status and deployment information is returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal

      • delete

        String delete(String serviceName)
        The Delete Hosted Service operation deletes the specified hosted service from Windows Azure.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal
        Returns:
        request id or null, if not found

      • deleteDeployment

        String deleteDeployment(String serviceName,
                      String deploymentName)
        The Delete Deployment operation deletes the specified deployment from Windows Azure.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal
        deploylentName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal

      • getDeployment

        Deployment getDeployment(String serviceName,
                       String deploymentName)
        The Get Deployment operation returns the specified deployment from Windows Azure.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal
        deploylentName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal
